column1: 10 pts - You have clearly identified the production function as the one that could benefit the most from implementing scrum/sprint methodologies and provided a detailed explanation of how it could operate for this function. Good job!

12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how scrum/sprint could operate. Great job explaining the benefits of scrum/sprint for the production function and providing a clear understanding of how it could be implemented. Keep up the good work!

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good attempt at explaining the poor fit of kanban for the production function, but could be more specific on how it doesn't address the iterative nature of the process. Keep up the good work!

10/10 - Great job identifying the distribution function as a suitable area for implementing kanban methodologies. Your explanation of how kanban could operate for this function is clear and well-organized. Keep up the good work!
12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how kanban could operate. Great job explaining the benefits of kanban for the distribution function.

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit

Comment: Good attempt at explaining the poor fit of scrum/sprint for the distribution function, but could provide more specific examples or details.
5 pts - You've selected a relevant bias (confirmation bias) and provided a clear explanation of how it could impact the decision-making process. Great job!
10/10 - Excellent job defining confirmation bias and providing actionable steps to avoid it in the decision-making process. Keep up the great work!

12 pts - Complete and clear description of possible problem. Great job in identifying and explaining the potential issues with implementing agile methodologies in Mighty Jaxx's functions. Keep up the good work!

10 pts - Great job! Your description of possible steps and actions for implementing Scrum/sprint and Kanban methodologies in Mighty Jaxx's production and distribution functions is clear and detailed. Keep up the good work!
